title: vanda vindai
sahitya:
vanda vindai kELaDi ennuyir nAthan


anupallavi

  cintai alaindalarit-tEDum pOd-oLindavan shen kaN ayarnda nici en kaNNE enrarugE


caraNam    inba tunba shuzhalil eTruNDalarak-kaNDum En enru kELAdavan
iLa vEnirk-kuyiliDam uLavellAm arindavan ennuLLE AnAn avan
anbirkku paNi sheyyum Anandan ariyAda mOnattilE aLLik-kalannait-
tuLLi viLaiyADinAn meLLa sholluvadenna kaLLan kathaiyai avan
